de.intarsys.security.smartcard.card

Class CommonCardConnection

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.intarsys.security.smartcard.card.CommonCardConnection
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ICardConnection, ICardTransmitter, de.intarsys.tools.attribute.IAttributeSupport
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    StandardCardConnection

    public abstract class CommonCardConnection
extends java.lang.Object
implements ICardConnection
    A common implementation for ICardConnection. This implementation provides the skeleton for real card acccess. Most important, it relies on an Executor to move card access in a thread of its own. This executor is used at least for connection, transaction and close.
